text: O foolish Galatians! Who has bewitched you that you not be persuaded by the TruthPerhaps 3% of the Greek manuscripts omit “that you not be persuaded by the Truth” (as in NIV, NASB, LB, TEV, etc.), which weakens the statement considerably.—Jesus Christ was clearly portrayed among you as having been crucified, before your very eyes!It almost sounds like there was a dramatic demonstration.
